alert.note: Alert for Wells (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 24 at 5:16PM CDT until June 24 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR NORTHERN WELLS COUNTY... At 516 PM CDT, the public reported water on County Road 5 2 miles west of Hamberg. Between 2 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Public reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Fessenden, Heimdal, Bremen, Manfred and Hamberg. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
